note.p: Lady Elizabeth Finch. Daughter of Heneage Finch, fourth earl of Aylesford, and his wife, Lady Louisa Thynne, daughter of Thomas Thynne, first marquess of Bath. Owner of a collection of British shells. Author of The Sampler: a system of teaching plain needlework in schools (1850).
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1592/427/1), 1861 (RG9/522/72/7)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 August 2022)
Westminster, London, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1558–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 August 2022)
